If \\( T(u) \\) is computed at time \\( t = 0 \\) for the initial condition \\( u(x,0) \\), and then \\( u(x, t) \\) is evolved according to the heat equation, will the result \\( T(u) \\) at time \\( t = T \\) match the integral transformation of the evolved state without \\( T \\) being directly reapplied?
